H0.text: Sedimentary rock group offers the richest source of fossils.

H1.text: Metamorphic is the rock group that offers the richest source of fossils.

H2.text: Igneous rock group offers the richest source of fossils.

H3.text: Geode offers the richest source of fossils.

A4.text: Fossils are most commonly found in sedimentary rock.

A5.text: Unlike most igneous and metamorphic rocks, sedimentary rocks form at temperatures and pressures that do not destroy fossil remnants.
